Comments: I received official admission approval only after all of my LOR submitted
International, 2 years research experience, several papers, got Governmental Scholarship for master's from my country

Apparently, the department makes a decision first and then suggests it to FGSR. Vouch from the professors helps but Department makes the final decisions. I had two interviews with two different professors - one in Nov 2022 and another in Feb 2023. The first prof vouched for me, by the grace of God; but the second prof was indifferent to recruit me
Received an unofficial acceptance letter from my PI that I was recommended for admissions!
Really surprised, wish I knew the reason
Got a full funding offer and recommendation letter for admission
Received an email to check portal. Recommended for admission.
